Description: Limestone stela with low relief decoration including a cross within a wreath and a pediment at the top; panel of incised Greek text.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.141)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: I.Brit.Mus.Gr. I App:11 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
